com.github.detro.browsermobproxyclient

Class BMPCLocalLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.detro.browsermobproxyclient.BMPCLocalLauncher

  • public class BMPCLocalLauncher
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class that takes care of Starting and Stopping a Local BrowserMob Proxy. "Local" means that it's located inside the Current User directory, inside .browsermob-proxy-client/browsermob-proxy-local. A version of BrowserMob Proxy is contained within the resources of this library. This class takes care of installing/uninstalling (zip/delete) it.

      • start

        public static void start()
        Start Local BrowserMob Proxy. It will also install it if not installed yet.

      • start

        public static void start(int port)
        Start Local BrowserMob Proxy. It will also install it if not installed yet.
        Parameters:
        port - Port to which BrowserMob Proxy needs to bind it's API

      • isRunning

        public static boolean isRunning()
        Check if Local BrowserMob Proxy is running.
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • isInstalled

        public static boolean isInstalled()
        Is a Local instance of BrowserMob Proxy installed?
        Returns:
        Returns "true" if a Local BrowserMob Proxy is installed, "false" otherwise.

      • install

        public static void install()
        Install Local BrowserMob Proxy.

      • uninstall

        public static void uninstall()
        Uninstall Local BrowserMob Proxy.

      • installedVersion

        public static java.lang.String installedVersion()
        Installed version of Local BrowserMob Proxy
        Returns:
        Version of Local BrowserMob Proxy, if installed. Throws @see BMPCLocalLauncherNotInstallerException if not installed. Please use BMPCLocalLauncher#isInstalled() to check first.
